Class DrawPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.ohio.ent.cs5500.DrawPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutChangeListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DrawPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements LayoutChangeListener
    CS 4500/5500 Advanced OO Design and GUI Techniques.
    This class is written as part of the course cs4500/5500 under guidance and instruction of Dr. Dusan Sormaz.
    This class defines the panel in which the graphing is done.
    Author:
    Arif
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
